name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: League of Legends: Champion Builds & Counters

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to conveniently grab champion builds and counters for League of Legends (using u.gg).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Because having to Google "Garen build" is lame and it's 2023. Very simple app with plans to integrate data into the extension itself without redirecting to an external site. Currently using u.gg for builds and counters.
